title: I really like the smell of mint
body:
Tried this rosemary mint shampoo, and I absolutely loved it

I kinda want to find other ways to, for example, make my room smell minty xd

What kind of products or homemade stuff are there? I remember a relative used to mix baking soda with something and make a minty carpet powder which made the house smell really good

https://mariposafarms.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/Mint.jpg
